claudette.title: Claudette
claudette.description: Step right up! Feast your eyes on this handsome beauty! A kiss on the cheek from whichever side you fancy for only 5 cents! 10 cents gets you a kiss from both!

hisLovelyAssistant.title: His Lovely Assistant
hisLovelyAssistant.description: Come! Say a prayer for this daring beauty! Our knife throwers daggers are razor sharp, so we hope his aim is true! Step right up! Who wants a bear? See for yourself how sharp these daggers are! What a brave beauty!

priscillaAndPeach.title: Priscilla and Peach
priscillaAndPeach.description: Come one! Come all!  Witness these hypnotizing beauties! Is she one girl or two? Stare deep into her spinning wand and let her make up your mind for you!

maxAndJax.title: Max and Jax
maxAndJax.description: A story of siamese twin teddy bears, who covet their independence so passionately that neither might survive... Read their story here: http://magnificentf.wix.com/maxandjax

bandLogo.title: Band Logo
bandLogo.description: "Ten paces and fire!" my friends' father shouted. The two men strode forth, turned, and blasted each other with birdshot. "Why?" we asked him. "We were bored."

zylphia.title: Zylphia
zylphia.description: Zylphia had misplaced her pet, she paced about, she cursed and fret. She found the door'd been left ajar but couldn't dream that he'd go far. She looked around with great suspense, while all admired her fashion sense.

violetAndVivian.title: Violet and Vivian
violetAndVivian.description: Violet and Vivian, two sisters share one trunk. When one drinks wine the other finds that she has gotten drunk. One likes dogs, the other cats, they share most things but never hats. They find that they have twice the fun, two heads are better than just one.

vertiline.title: Vertiline
vertiline.description: Vertiline, oh Vertiline, She met her end on Valentines. She stepped into the lions cage and tamed them there upon the stage. The lions all behaved so well, was to the tiger that she fell.

eudora.title: Eudora
eudora.description: Eudora, much to her dismay, perished deep beneath the waves. And to this day she haunts the seas, but her story's not sad you see, for in her watery grave her bones did fall in love with Davy Jones.

flora.title: Flora
flora.description: Flora hates to sit up straight, to be proper is frightening. But she can't move a hair since the day she was dared to get herself struck by lightning. She cannot help but look morose, for now her body's comatose. But now she has a good excuse for being lazy and obtuse.

maryAnnCotton.title: Mary Ann Cotton
maryAnnCotton.description: Mary Ann Cotton whose core was quite rotten had herself husbands galore. By the time she was hung for what she had done, she had gotten rid of four, put sixteen children in their graves, and killed her mother, and a maid. Perhaps she suffered too much stress from a foul case of PMS.

Oliver_A_Hummingbird.title: Oliver A. Hummingbird
Oliver_A_Hummingbird.description: Is quite fond of his hat. He is quite sure it is the tallest hat any hummingbird ever had. Sold, prints available

Lysander_A_Albatros.title: Lysander A. Albatros
Lysander_A_Albatros.description: Is of a devious nature, and is often found to be up to no good. Sold, prints available

Mercy_A_Bluebird.title: Mercy A. Bluebird
Mercy_A_Bluebird.description: Devoted her life to those stricken with avian influenza. Often sheds tears at the thought of salt spoons who've become lost through cracks in the floorboards. Sold, prints available

Margory_A_Quail.title: Margory A. Quail
Margory_A_Quail.description: Dashes in front of cars sending them careening off into ditches, whereupon their drivers inquire at a local truck stop, and find that she was killed in an auto accident ten years ago this very night! Sold, prints available

Winthrop_A_Owl.title: Winthrop A. Owl
Winthrop_A_Owl.description: Enjoys long strolls in the dead of night, and peering at people suspiciously through his monocle. He also finds fancy trousers much to his liking. Sold, prints available

Thaddeus_A_Peacock.title: Thaddeus A. Peacock
Thaddeus_A_Peacock.description: Takes great delight in his finery, yet cannot dress himself as he is deterred by his deathly fear of buttons. Sold, prints available

Iphignea_A_Magpie.title: Iphignea A. Magpie
Iphignea_A_Magpie.description: Is suspected of poisoning eight husbands, and has an affection for moths of the tasty variety. Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

Fingers_A_Pelican.title: Fingers A. Pelican and Jimmy The Fish
Fingers_A_Pelican.description: Are suspected of foul play, but you won't mention it if you value your kneecaps. Sold, prints available

Lenore_A_Raven.title: Lenore A. Raven
Lenore_A_Raven.description: Finds pathological entertainment in plucking at shiny objects. Often found attacking door knockers just after they have been polished, and disturbing their inhabitants. Sold, prints available

Chauncey_A_Rockdove.title: Chauncey A. Rockdove
Chauncey_A_Rockdove.description: Has an inclination toward bowties, and tends to favor the taste of pocket watches. Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

Aloysius_A_Flamingo.title: Aloysius A. Flamingo
Aloysius_A_Flamingo.description: Claims to have come from Paris. Enjoys strolling in the park and eating ice cream, and can not be found doing much else. Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

Byron_A_Hornedowl.title: Byron A. Hornedowl
Byron_A_Hornedowl.description: Is taken to lurking about and giving ominous stares.  It is rumored that he will devour an unattended fledgling, though evidence of this is yet to be found. Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

King_Of_Hearts.title: The King Of Hearts
King_Of_Hearts.description: The King of Hearts. Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

Sunset.title: I Feel Like A Sunset
Sunset.description: I Feel Like A Sunset. Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

Ooze.title: Ooze
Ooze.description: Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco

Lurk.title: Lurk
Lurk.description: Available - Currently showing at Studio Hix in downtown San Francisco
